bibl.title: Greek Papyri from the Fayum in the Cairo Egyptian Museum
bibl.seg: Nicola Reggiani, Greek Papyri from the Fayum in the Cairo Egyptian Museum = Papyrotheke. 13.

P. Cairo Reggiani 1-20. Texts studied during the International Seminar on Unpublished Papyri from the Egyptian Museum at Cairo, an initiative sponsored by the AIP and held between 2011 and 2014. - Introduction. - Ptolemaic texts. - Roman texts: Sokrates' registers. - Roman texts: more from the Sokrates Archive. - Roman texts: accounts and lists. - Roman texts: receipts. - Roman texts: various. - Bibliography. Indices. Plates.
